Screaming Biology!!!..


*Science is so dense, been doing a lot of deep dive learning human behavior biology and personality traits *

This is one of the most fascinating persons in the field of science. Dr. Robert Sapolsky’s book “Behave” is so fundamental in my understanding of filtering what is good and bad as we are wired of so much neural networks where it is rather becoming difficult to say that we are all making decisions as a cause of free will.
